answers.answer: Dont know why the hell all my n's turned into b's in the beginning, lmao. Stupid phone keyboard!

Well, I'm 26 weeks and my doctor told me to have it early cause I can deliver earlier than my due date, I have a cerclage and have gestational diabetes, so to be sure, he told me to do it in my 7 month, but I'm gonna have it earlier than that because my cousin came from my country and wanted to help with the decorations, and besides is better to do it early because u have time to buy whatever u didn't get
Im having mine August 16th, and im due October 21st. I dont think november is too early. Especially since you are having twins.

question: I'll know more as my pregbabcy advances (healthwise), but I am wondering wheb I should have my baby shower as Im due with twins Feb 16th abd its common for twins to come between 35~38 weeks. Depending on the woman and babies health. Would mid-late November be too early or ideal? I was thinking mid November.
title: Good Baby Shower date?
